subject: Entrepreneurship
title: Founder Burnout: The Silent Epidemic
description: A micro-lesson that makes Founder Burnout: The Silent Epidemic usable.

hook.text: Arianna Huffington collapsed from exhaustion at her desk, broke her cheekbone, and woke up in blood.

buildup.text: Burnout is chronic stress that leads to emotional exhaustion, cynicism, and a sense of ineffectiveness.

discovery.text: A UC Berkeley study found 72% of founders self-reported mental health concerns. Most suffer in silence.

twist.text: Hustle culture glorifies burnout as a badge of honor. But exhausted founders make catastrophic decisions.

climax.text: After her collapse, Huffington pivoted her entire career to focus on wellnessâ€”and built Thrive Global.

punchline.text: You can't pour from an empty cup.

quiz.question: What are the three key symptoms of burnout?
options: Emotional exhaustion, cynicism, and a sense of ineffectiveness
Physical illness, memory loss, and insomnia
Boredom, lack of motivation, and social withdrawal
